node.title: üì∑ #Photography : Ravindra Nath Tagore Statue
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
It's always hard to find the right photo to click. I know it is not the greatest of photos but would like to share with you all. One important fact about Ravindra Nath Tagore is that he has written the national anthems of two countries India's Jana Gana Mana and Bangladesh's Amar Shonar Bangla whereas the Sri Lankan national anthem was inspired by his work. 

He was a great poet and people remember him for his work done.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmevZzYKQdbCuo4gGSmoDWM4cGEYinW9Xfb1WiHqEfMwLv/image.png)

node.title: Do you want to show the world that you are Rich ?
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
I was surfing through Google Play Store in the paid apps section and guess what I have found a lot of app which will make you feel rich.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRMXGHZpQxR7wdJp5RpruzK6brRVfYrV5twNJgNWS2gxS/image.png)
The price was highlighted to show the cost of each app.

Now read the description of the first one, it says with this app you can show the world that you are rich :P

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmR12hDqQugj8Wfhq1MgfTmQohGTZ5pDajeeSHRQ1khUuH/image.png)

And the funny reviews follows. One such review is "This app changed my life. One morning, I woke up being poor. So I saved all of my money to buy this app. It's incredible, and shows that I have money even when I actually don't. I don't know what I would do without it." I mean seriously.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfZF7wnGfjk3ZTZQ86g5NWuorTWifJZBTB8j42FbeLA3G/image.png)

### What's the purpose of this applications?
###

Well to prove to the world that you are RICH.

I mean wow. I was speechless. I immediately left the Play Store.s

node.title: Are you motivated ? - An Article on Motivation
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
## At first let me ask you a question what is Motivation?
##
Motivation is described as the manner that initiates, guides, and maintains intention-orientated behaviors. Motivation is what reasons us to behave, whether or not it is getting a glass of water to lessen thirst or reading an e-book to benefit expertise.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZZPusY2BRtL2ZExhpAYs6S9P2umrfjoDjc82cXJK2ama/image.png)

In regular usage, the time period motivation is regularly used to explain why someone does some thing. For example, you may say that a scholar is so prompted to get into top college or university that he spends every night time studying.

### What are the things that actually motivate us to act? 
###

Instincts (a natural or innate impulse, inclination, or tendency.) & Drives (to send, expel, or otherwise cause to move by force or compulsion) and Needs (necessity) are three main things which actually motivate us to act. 

### Different Types of Motivation
###

There are mainly two types of motivation Extrinsic Motivations and Intrinsic Motivation.

Extrinsic motivations are those who arise from outside of the person and often involve rewards consisting of trophies, cash, social popularity or praise. Intrinsic motivations are those who stand up from within the individual, consisting of doing a complicated password puzzle merely for the non-public gratification of solving a hassle.

### Small Story on Motivation
###

Note : "This beautiful story came to me via whatsapp but I don't know where it originated"

A man discovered a cocoon of a butterfly. One day a small opening appeared. He sat and watched the butterfly for numerous hours because it struggled to squeeze its body through the tiny hole. Then it stopped as though it couldn‚Äôt move similarly. So the person determined to assist the butterfly. He took a couple of scissors and snipped off the closing bits of cocoon. The butterfly emerged without problems but it had a swollen frame and reduced in size wings.

The man continued to watch it, expecting that any minute the wings would enlarge and expand enough to support the body, neither happened! In fact the butterfly spent the rest of its life crawling around. It was never able to fly.

**What the man in his kindness and haste did not understand:** The restricting cocoon and the struggle required by the butterfly to get through the opening was a way of forcing the fluid from the body into the wings so that it would be ready for flight once that was achieved.

### Motto of the story
###

Sometimes struggles are exactly what we need in our lives. Going through life with no obstacles would cripple us. We will not be as strong as we could have been and we would never fly.

I will conclude my post by saying a great quote by a great scientist ‚ÄúNo matter how good you are at planning, the pressure never goes away. So I don't fight it. I feed off it. I turn pressure into motivation to do my best.

So again my question remains the same "Are you motivated?"

node.title: Fancy Grass in Kolkata - A horse made of Grass
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Today my friend has shared this image with me. This image is from Kolkata, West Bengal, India. I have never seen this type of thing here in India, thus I can say my India is improving in looks. 

That's actually fancy because it has to be maintained well. And till now they have maintained it well. Oh I forgot to say I was born and brought up in Kolkata and it was very dirty previously. Since the last 3 years I have seen a lot of improvement in the beautification of the city. Great Work Management. Would love to see more of this initiative.

node.title: Free Bitcoins - Trusted and Verified
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Do you wonder where you can get some free bitcoins? As of now Bitcoin is over 4000$, and its very difficult to get even 1 Bitcoin (you can get bitcoins even in 1$) but that's not the point. We can see the benefits of using them but we are skeptical that what if it crashes tomorrow.

So, in this post, I will share one such site which is trusted and its verified by me. Before jumping in let‚Äôs just be clear, there is no shortcut to get wealthy without working or investing for it. Say, in Steemit also you have to work hard day and night to write good posts to see your earnings increase. It is just impossible to make an income in bitcoins or any other currency just by clicking around on some websites.

### Disclaimer: You will not get rich in earning bitcoins, is just that you will get extra bitcoins to play with Cryptos, if you have not started. I am also not posting my referrer id if you think that it is just to get enough referrers.
###

One such website is FreeBitcoin (https://freebitco.in), which I am using for the last 1 month. The model of this website is you will earn Satoshis every hour (As of now the satoshis is 44). 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRiwF3ipreo6y3anv7f97Ley46R6qfxU7PMLeb8mkJ1CH/image.png)

You have to click the Play button and based on the Lucky Number you will get the payments. I have even got 500 satoshis but which is very rare. Once you have played you have to wait 60 minutes until you play again.

Then you have an option to play bet. There is 47.5% chance that you will win the bet. Try to play it on your own risk because you sometimes lose a lot. I have lost more than 8000 satoshis by ignoring the fact. Now I am little more thoughtful.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUufHKsA6wdQhcquJhgsj1fgMhWtr3apnDgJ2EczepZav/image.png)

Now if you have more than 30000 satoshis you will even earn interest(Annual interest 4.08%). I have earned around  150 satoshis in interest.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaksBiSa7SfrjU8tDYRyfp6bLuHiAnsz2KyJpJwKoR46b/image.png)

I will leave other things to be explored by you itself. Just before ending this post I would like to tell you that I have earned 0.00051461 BTC till now. As I said it's not huge, but can be tried.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcmxRVrAB5pHHMgXa2wLAQQsnhN843HoEqgqLVmJyVTut/image.png)

### Disclaimer Again:  I am also not posting my referrer id if you think that this post is just to get enough referrers.

### Upvote, Follow, Resteem @codingdefined

node.title: When it comes in Advertisement, nothing can beat Durex
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Have a look at the below advertisement it says "Dear JON, We Incest you use Protection". They are insisting Jon to have condom before doing anything.

If you do not know Durex is the trademarked name for a range of condoms that were made by United Kingdom-based SSL International.

node.title: In 80 year old painting it looks like someone is holding a Smart Phone? What you think
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNrANWse4g3CtCT838ztXaETxUGefc6wx6b5HxU4WcXwt/image.png)

Picture Courtesy : https://postalmuseum.si.edu/indiansatthepostoffice/mural9.html

It came to notice when by the Motherboards magazine and its breaking the internet ever since. You can read the whole thing out here https://motherboard.vice.com/en_us/article/a3db9b/iphone-man-1937-painting

The few lines from the article is 

>Lower right quadrant. Seated. Holding a small, black, rectangular object at about eye level.

>See him?

>It's not clear exactly who this man is, but he might as well be popping off a selfie or thumbing through his news feed. He seems to gaze into the handheld device in such a way that renders all-too-familiar today, as if he's just read a bad tweet or recoiling from a Trump-related push notification from the Times. He would almost look unremarkable, if only he and the world around him existed at any point in the past decade.

So I would like to know from my fellow steemians that do you believe there exists a time travel where someone from the future dropped his smartphone in the 19th century.  

If not the time travel, what you think is he holding by seeing his expression. Is it a mirror.
